skill.name: Spooky
skill.perk: Higher chance for good events, lower chance of bad events.
skill.perk_bonus: Higher chance for good events, lower chance of bad events.
Spooky5a.name: Gambler
Spooky5b.name: Assistant
Spooky5b.desc: Daily quests occur three times as often.
Spooky10a1.name: Spookyy
Spooky10a2.name: Fortune Teller
Spooky10b1.name: Shooting Star
Spooky10b1.desc: Nightly events occur twice as often.
Spooky10b2.name: Spirit Child
Spooky10b2.desc:
Giving gifts makes junimos happy. They might help your farm.
(15% chance for some form of farm advancement.)
junimo-rewards.animal-friendship: The junimos made some of your animals more fond of you!
junimo-rewards.grow-grass: The junimos grew your grass and repaired your fences!
junimo-rewards.prismatic-shard: The junimos gave you a prismatic shard!
